pullrequest.title: Add random walk support to GaussianNoise

content.raw: @nkoenig @asymingt @hsu @scpeters I don't want this to bit rot, so how best to proceed. I was thinking about just updating it from time delta to taking an absolute time. Would be in a good place to merge it then? Implementing the position correlated noise seems to warrant more thought and a separate PR.
content.html: @nkoenig @asymingt @hsu @scpeters I don't want this to bit rot, so how best to proceed. I was thinking about just updating it from time delta to taking an absolute time. Would be in a good place to merge it then? Implementing the position correlated noise seems to warrant more thought and a separate PR.
